documents.title: System Design Notes - Microservices
documents.content: Key principles for microservice architecture: 1) Single responsibility per service, 2) Independent deployment, 3) Decentralized data management. Consider using event-driven communication for loose coupling. Service mesh like Istio can handle cross-cutting concerns.

documents.title: Kubernetes Best Practices
documents.content: Resource limits are crucial for cluster stability. Always set CPU/memory requests and limits. Use namespaces for environment separation. Implement health checks (liveness and readiness probes). Consider using Horizontal Pod Autoscaler for dynamic scaling.

documents.title: Database Sharding Strategy Research
documents.content: Analyzed various sharding approaches for our user database. Hash-based sharding provides even distribution but makes range queries difficult. Range-based sharding maintains query efficiency but requires careful key design. Recommendation: Use composite sharding key (user_region + user_id) for our use case.
